ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Soloing bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... i find it too hard to wait around for a balanced group, so i grab whoever happens to be around and drag em off to sebilis.  well actually most of the time
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:59 PM 1/30/01 -1000, you wrote:
>I agree totally. I was very careful when I worded that statement. It
>doesn't apply to a group where you are filling the holes nearly as much as
>it does to a balanced group.
>
>My experiences are probably different from most, though given my preferred
>places to hunt. I don't hunt outdoors, I don't like it. I'm a dungeon
>addict to the extreme. I also like to make a group and go to a dungeon
>where there just aren't any people around except a couple groups. This
>combination means that more often than not, I'm in a balanced group.
>
>Kaelrei


i find it too hard to wait around for a balanced group, so i grab whoever happens to
be around and drag em off to sebilis. well actually most of the time i just live in
sebilis and pick up whoever happens to be hanging around the zonein. so we usually
have at least on hole in the group, sometimes more, heh.
